infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses your location to track drives safely.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses your location even when running in the background for drive safety features.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses your location even when running in the background for drive safety features.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera for features like scanning QR codes.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs photo library access to let you pick a profile picture.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This identifier will be used to deliver personalized rewards and improve the experience.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app may use your microphone for voice-driven safety features.
